_xResult.title: Pep in My Step Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made metallic top with peplum
_xResult.longdesc:
It's essential to have a piece in your closet that is unique, yet easily pairs with multiple looks. Search no further than this metallic, peplum, front-plunge top. It is the perfect pair to short, long, or midi skirts and trousers. The made to measure top will emphasize your waist while the peplum stylishly disguises your hips.

You need a top made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
